amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike a provision that would eliminate an existing statutory requirement that the Coast Guard appoint an ombudsman in each Coast Guard District.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-267 to strike a provision that would eliminate an existing statutory requirement that the Coast Guard appoint an ombudsman in each Coast Guard District.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 227 (Roll no. 832).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Cummings.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 227 (Roll no. 832).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
